item.ptxt: When adjusting the door in or out, replace the mounting bolts (A); refer to the appropriate Parts Catalog for the necessary adjusting bolts.
Apply spot sealer to the mating surfaces, then install the hood, the doors, the tailgate, and the hinges.
Check the hood, the doors, and the tailgate positions; refer to the external parts fitting positions.
Apply sealant around the tailgate hinges.

trans.ptxt: NOTE: Because the clip for attaching the front fender is located inside the front portion of the front corner glass, remove the front fender in the following procedures.

s1.ptxt: Remove these items; refer to the appropriate Fit/Jazz Shop Manual:
Remove the front fender mounting bolts (A).
Detach the front pillar portion of the front fender (B) from the outer panel by removing the sealer (C).
NOTE: Take care not to deform the front pillar portion of the front fender.
Lift and hold the front portion of the front fender (A). Detach the front fender from the clip (B) on the outer panel by sliding the front fender forward, then remove the front fender.
When replacing the clip on the outer panel, remove the front corner glass; refer to the appropriate Fit/Jazz Shop Manual, and remove the clip from the outer panel by drilling the rivet of the clip.
When the clip is removed from the outer panel, set the new clip according to the outer panel form, and fasten the clip to the outer panel by using a rivet tool.
Apply the sealer (A) to the position shown in the illustration of the front pillar outer panel (B).
Apply spot sealer to the mating surfaces between the front fender and the body panel.
Align and set the front fender (A) to the clip (B) on the outer panel.
Attach the front fender (A) with the bolts.
NOTE: Make sure the front pillar portion of the front fender is fixed to the body certainly with the sealer (B).
Install the hood, then check for differences in level and clearance.Check the external parts fitting positions. Make sure the body lines flow smoothly.
Install the removed parts; refer to the appropriate Fit/Jazz Shop Manual:
Adjust the headlights to local requirements; refer to the appropriate Fit/Jazz Shop Manual.
